title: Mihir Agarwal
text:
Mihir Agarwal
Hi, I am currently a Research Fellow at Microsoft Research India, where I am currently working in the intersection of Representation Learning and Dense Retrieval under the mentorship of Kirankumar Shiragur, Ankit Garg, and Neeraj Kayal
Previously, I completed my B.Tech from the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar in Electrical Engineering with Honors and a Minor in Computer Science and Engineering.

Highlights Timeline


Jul 2025
Best Paper Award — IEEE Space, Aerospace and Defence Conference
Recognized for leading work on uncertainty bounds for anomalous geomagnetic storm forecasting.
